stories.text:
"Google couldn’t verify this account belongs to you."

I clear cookies once in a while and usually can recover my account but this time, no option to recover: https://i.imgur.com/6yefsS5.png

Even if I have the correct login and password.
stories.title: Tell HN: Lost access to my Google account even with the correct credentials

stories.text:
We manually collected the best open source tools based on their Github rating (stars). All of these tools are used with K8s to build, deploy, monitor and secure workloads. You can check our work here:

https://thechief.io/c/editorial/top-51-kubernetes-tool-to-reach-the-cloud-native-nirvana/
